get.desc: Lists the autoscale settings for a resource group

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.desc: Successful request for a list of autoscale settings

patch.desc: Updates an existing AutoscaleSettingsResource. To update other fields use the CreateOrUpdate method.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.desc: An existing autoscale setting resource was successfully updated.
